name: Neon Bike Battle
description:
Play the New Neon Bike Battle, No Battle Rules, Kill All. Neon Bike Battle Is the Most Beautiful and Addictive Survival, Battle, Action, and Survival Game. Get Ready for the Most Exciting Battle. Neon Battle! Race with Different Models of Neon Bikes on the Neon World.

Pick Your Favorite Neon Bike and Enjoy the Ride Throughout Lots of Neon Buildings, Mountains, and Hills. Play in Different Worlds, and Lighten Up with Different Colors.

Your Goal Is Simple! Drive Your Light Bike Through Cyberspace Leaving an Energy Wall Behind You in Heated Battles! Eliminate All Your Opponents While Avoiding Bumping Other Rider's Energy Walls, While Driving at the Speed of Light!

Whether You’re Bold or Careful, Outwit Your Opponents by Finding the Best Strategy to Destroy Them Before They Destroy You. Stay Cautious, You Have a Weak Point - Your Whole Bike. If You Ever Drive into a Wall or Another Opponent's Trail, Your Dead!


features
- Simple Controls
- Nice Sounds and Music.
- Great Gameplay.
- Make Insane Stunts!
- Try to Reach the Maximum Score.
- Different Neon Color Bikes.
- Different Battlefield and Arenas.
